fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations
eu_initiatives:
-    We have been working with the CPFE, which is the think-tank for ECPM on the issue of minorities in Syria and Iraq. We lobbied for the engagement of the Kurds and other minorities in creating an EU supported solution of the war that’s going on in the region.  
-    Collaborated with the CPFE in creating an alliance between different minorities in Iraq.  
-    We have had assistance of individual MEPs who wanted to endorse our reports on persecution in several countries.  
-    We contributed to a statement of the European Parliament Working Group on Freedom of Religion or Belief regarding Sri Lanka’s policy on deportation of Pakistani asylum seekers.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: Member of the North Korea Freedom Coalition
relevant_communication:
We are continuously building networks and doing lobby work to serve for the voiceless. We create legal reports in order to be able to address situations through political means. We aim to assist refugees/asylum seekers with legal, political and material aid through our network.  
 
We do our work in cooperation with members of parliament and with other NGO's lobbying with the EU.
goals__remit: Jubilee Campaign promotes the human rights and religious liberty of ethnic and religious minorities around the world because we value freedom and democracy and our right to choose, speak, and believe. We document human rights abuses and advocate with consultative status at the United Nations.
